text: Capra is a genus of the subfamily Caprinae and the family Bovidae. The domestic goat and other animals like it belong to this genus. == Taxonomy == * Genus Capra ** Wild Goat (Capra aegagrus), and the domestic goat ** Alpine Ibex (Capra ibex) ** Walia Ibex (Capra walie) ** West Caucasian Tur (Capra caucasica) ** East Caucasian Tur (Capra cylindricornis) ** Spanish Ibex (Capra pyrenaica) ** Markhor (Capra falconeri) (National animal of Pakistan) Image:Domestic goat May 2006.jpg|A domestic goat Image:Capra caucasica.jpeg|A West Caucasuan Tur Image:Markhor.jpg|A Markhor == Other websites == Category:Caprids
title: Capra (genus)
